text.commonboat.config.title: Common-Boat Config
text.commonboat.config.enable_mod.toolti: Master toggle to enable or disable Common-Boat entirely.
text.commonboat.config.slipperiness_valu: Overrides slipperiness for boats on ice.
text.commonboat.config.velocity_value.to: Overrides velocity multiplier for boats in water.
text.commonboat.config.step_height_value: Overrides step height for boats. Vanilla is 0.
text.commonboat.config.remove_air_drag.t: Prevents the boat from slowing down while in the air.
text.commonboat.config.max_jump_height.t: Limits the Flappy Bird jump height. Set to -1 to disable.
text.commonboat.config.max_speed.tooltip: Limits the speed of the boat. Set to -1 to disable.
text.commonboat.config.fish_detection_di: Sets the detection distance for Le Fische Au Chocolat.
text.commonboat.config.enable_flappybird:
Controls in-air jump height with view pitch.
Look up to jump higher (max 5), look down to jump lower (min 0).
text.commonboat.config.captured_fish_she:
A public Google Sheets URL to override the captured fish list.
Must be a CSV export link or a standard sheet link.
Leave empty to use the default list.
